fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Replace a person's body every Full Moon night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Killed players will appear as alive to the town until they are voted up to the stand, or if they are visited by another person during the night or any night after they die.
- A fabricated player being voted up to stand can be pardoned or executed as normal.
- On Blood Moon nights, you may kill and fabricate a player.
- A player you have successfully fabricated will be seen as "Fabricated" during a death flip, and their last will is not shown.
- You will know your target's role and will.
- Detection Immunity during non-moon nights.
- Conversion Immunity
